mapper.update:
UPDATE user
account=#{account},
pwd=#{pwd},
name=#{name},
gender=#{gender},
year=#{year},
profile=#{profile},
comment=#{comment},
email=#{email},
qq_openid=#{qqOpenid},
qq_name=#{qqName},
update_id=0, update_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, version=version+1,
WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE user SET account=#{id}, email=#{id}, qq_openid=#{id}, is_delete=1, update_id=0, update_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, version=version+1, WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select u.account, if(u.pwd='','无密码','') as hasPwd, u.name, if(u.gender=0,'女','男') as gender, u.year, u.profile, u.comment, if(u.email=u.id,'',u.email) as email, if(u.qq_openid=u.id,'未绑定','') as bindQq, u.qq_name as qqName, if(u.is_delete=1,'已删除','') as isDelete, if(u.create_id=0,'',a1.name) as createName, u.create_time as createTime, if(u.update_id=0,'',a2.name) as updateName, u.update_time as updateTime, u.version from user as u inner join admin as a1 on u.create_id = a1.id inner join admin as a2 on u.update_id=a2.id order by u.id desc
